title: Webview Deeplink - Go-AheadPay
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app*
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps:
WHEN user has access to deeplink

former example: ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpwa.use1.venuepaas.com%2FPWA%2FClInti47Bw%2F50%2Finitiate%3Fmodule%3DmyWallet%26provider%3Dappetize%26type%3Dfnb%26paymentProvider%3D7&displayTitle=Go-Ahead%20Pay&utm_source=Ballpark&utm_medium=Home&venueID=5&dataTier=3
(note:dataTier argument and displayTitle(iOS only))


**Phillies** 
ballpark://webview
url=https%3A%2F%2Fpwa.use1.venuepaas.com%2FPWA%2FpHIFKKYrai%2F188%2Finitiate%3Fmodule%3DmyWallet%26provider%3Dbypass%26type%3Dfnb%26extCardSource%3D1%26paymentProvider%3D7&venueID=2681&dataTier=3
**Cleveland Guardians** 
ballpark://webview
url=https%3A%2F%2Fpwa.use1.venuepaas.com%2FPWA%2FClInti47Bw%2F50%2Finitiate%3Fmodule%3DmyWallet%26provider%3Dappetize%26type%3Dfnb%26paymentProvider%3D7&venueID=5&dataTier=3

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user accesses webview deeplink for Go-Ahead Pay
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to deeplink that is configured (typically the MLB wallet page specific to the club)

example: ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpwa.use1.venuepaas.com%2FPWA%2FClInti47Bw%2F50%2Finitiate%3Fmodule%3DmyWallet%26provider%3Dappetize%26type%3Dfnb%26paymentProvider%3D7&displayTitle=Go-Ahead%20Pay&utm_source=Ballpark&utm_medium=Home&venueID=5&dataTier=3

title: Context Card - Go-AheadPay - Plan Your Next Stadium Visit [CLE Fan]
custom_preconds:
[BP-10991](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-10991 ) / [BP-11077](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11077 ) / [BP-11107](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11107 ) / [BP-11076](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11076 )
[Home Content Display - Context Cards](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10xB__FHRwQeGhhjW2ZF6MXAbvAuOZPxBobcZOQQH_EI/edit?gid=0#gid=0 )


GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app*
AND user is logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps: WHEN user has fave team set to CLE (teamID=114)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to Home tab w/ specified criteria (this could change based on configuration)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown MLB Wallet Context Card 
*Title: "Access your wallet with Go-Ahead Pay"
*Description: "Pay for concessions effortlessly with stored cards & entitlements."
*SideImg: Image of a credit card with Team logo 
*CTA: Arrow


**above is configured w/in CardCreator and is subject to change

AND the section title above the card is "Plan Your Next Stadium Visit"** 

**SECTION TITLE may not necessary be shown
Should be shown IF USER HAS TICKETS ON THE ACCT 
    OR IF USER DOES NOT HAVE TICKETS, but also has GoAheadEntry Card shown
IF GoAheadPay card is within the first listed section, then SECTION TITLE IS NOT SHOWN)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the MLB Wallet Context Card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to deeplink that is configured (typically the MLB wallet page specific to the club)

example: ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpwa.use1.venuepaas.com%2FPWA%2FClInti47Bw%2F50%2Finitiate%3Fmodule%3DmyWallet%26provider%3Dappetize%26type%3Dfnb&displayTitle=Go%20Ahead%20Pay&dataTier=3

[iOS] [BP-11202](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11202 )
AND The Home tab will look for a fullScreen=true URL parameter when presenting a ballpark://webview deep link.  When this value is true, the web view will:
1. Be presented as a full screen (covering the tab bar, animating up)
2. Continue to include the same client side navigation bar color as the NavigationStack web views (currently black)
3. Continue to include title text in the middle that will either show the  displayTitle passed in the deep link, or automatically update according to the current web page’s title if displayTitle was not included in the link
4. Include a leading (left side) button with the text “Close”, that will dismiss the web view (animating down)

title: MLBWallet - EventHub[CLE]
custom_preconds:
[BP-11082](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11082 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed iOS 14.1.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub
AND the EventHub has configured Wallet for the ticketed event




To configure venue_links (wallet) the following can be used to help with understanding
*mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e
**venue_links_v1_beta is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1_beta ) controlling BP-Client Staging
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client QA

*mlb-ballpark-app-831
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-ballpark-app-831](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client Prod
BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN EventHub for the venue has configured Wallet for the ticketed event
WHEN User is on the Home Tab
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections
AND there is an entry within Stadium Info section shows the desired icon (wallet) prior to the the text (Go-Ahead Pay)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Go-Ahead Pay entry within Stadium info
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to the new 3rd party web view, passing over relevant data (dataTier=3)

[iOS] [BP-11203](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11203 )
AND The Even Hub will look for a fullScreen:true URL configuration parameter when presenting a venue link.  When this value is true, the web view will:
1. Be presented as a full screen (covering the tab bar, animating up)
2. The navigation bar color will be the same black as the home tab full screen color
3. Continue to display the link’s title property in the navigation header
4. Include a leading (left side) button with the text “Close”, that will dismiss the web view (animating down)

title: MLBWallet - EventHub[PHI]
custom_preconds:
[BP-11082](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11082 )


GIVEN User has successfully authenticated into Ballpark (installed iOS 14.1.0 or later)
AND User has verified their account
AND User has tickets to an upcoming game to a home team venue that is supported for Event Hub
AND the EventHub has configured Wallet for the ticketed event




To configure venue_links (wallet) the following can be used to help with understanding
*mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e
**venue_links_v1_beta is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1_beta ) controlling BP-Client Staging
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobiletools-npd-d08e/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client QA

*mlb-ballpark-app-831
**venue_links_v1 is a configuration listed within [mlb-ballpark-app-831](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/firestore/databases/-default-/data/~2Fvenue_links_v1 ) controlling BP-Client Prod
BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN EventHub for the venue has configured Wallet for the ticketed event
WHEN User is on the Home Tab
AND User taps on Home NextTicketed Event card (CTA above 'Open Tickets')
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is directed to the EventHub page for that specific venue
AND user the venue image is directly above My Tickets and Stadium Info sections
AND there is an entry within Stadium Info section shows the desired icon (wallet) prior to the the text (Go-Ahead Pay)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Go-Ahead Pay entry within Stadium info
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to the new 3rd party web view, passing over relevant data (dataTier=3)

[iOS] [BP-11203](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-11203 )
AND The Even Hub will look for a fullScreen:true URL configuration parameter when presenting a venue link.  When this value is true, the web view will:
1. Be presented as a full screen (covering the tab bar, animating up)
2. The navigation bar color will be the same black as the home tab full screen color
3. Continue to display the link’s title property in the navigation header
4. Include a leading (left side) button with the text “Close”, that will dismiss the web view (animating down)

title: PHI
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has downloaded the Ballpark app
custom_steps:
GIVEN User QR Code scan (PHI) to register into Go-Ahead Pay
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14552980)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN App not installed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
WHEN App not installed

THEN User taken to the App store to Download the app
AND User should be able to log in with their verified account
AND open the registration experience for Go-Ahead Pay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN App installed
AND App backgrounded/not opened
AND User not logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
HEN User taken to the Log in page
AND User should be able to log in with their verified account
AND open the registration experience for Go-Ahead Pay

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN App installed
AND App backgrounded/not opened
AND User is logged in
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN open the registration experience for Go-Ahead Pay
